body:
This video is just a short montage of a few games I played earlier today. It's my only dedicated "rushing" video, as I've always been more of a defender. Turns out that I'm a decent rusher without Sfkwww annoying me on Skype. Lately I've been playing Avicus with Sfkwww, and that was it. I'm going to start playing solo Avicus a bit more often, and rushing a lot more. Like I said this was just a few matches I played earlier today. Enjoy! :D


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j3j87_ILrNY&feature=youtu.be

title: Avicus Rushing Montage

replies.body:
Please, not another sfk ;-;

On topic: You might want to turn down your sensitivity, it looks like you have trouble aiming while pvping.

replies.body: hahahaha, I was a little bit jittery at the moment, but I understand why you say that.
